name: carnap.io dark mode
description:
Switches the website, carnap.io, to a high contrast, dark mode.
Essentially white text and items on a black background
additional_info:
Currently a work in progress, some items are also being targeted to be recoloured

Update 2: Ensured that some input text is black on a white background for some questions
Update 1: Changed the colour of the output text on success, so it is readable
